en.title: Work experience
en.description: With over 6 years of professional experience, I specialize in full-stack development across diverse tech stacks. I have worked with leading companies like Mercado Libre and ICBC, demonstrating expertise in Java and JavaScript technologies.

items.description: I collaborate with Outlier, implementing Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF) to optimize machine learning model performance and learning efficiency.

items.description: As a Software Developer at MercadoLibre, I developed comprehensive full-stack solutions, applying advanced software engineering practices and innovative UI techniques.
items.fullDescription:
○ Responsibilities 
 • Design and implementation of REST APIs with Java 11 
 • Development of components using ReactJS 
 • Implementation of component mapping using Server Driven UI technique 
 • Participation in agile planning and task management 
|
 ○ Projects 
 • Inbound Invoice Creator 
 Sophisticated REST API in Java to efficiently process and analyze spreadsheets containing shipment and invoice data. 
 • Complementary Invoices 
 API that enables vendors to upload and manage pending invoices to avoid fiscal issues.

items.description: In my first professional role, I developed comprehensive software solutions for ICBC's Corporate Banking platform using Java, JSP, Struts, and JavaScript technologies.
items.fullDescription:
During my first professional experience at ICBC, I was mentored by senior and mid-level developers, expanding my web development skills and learning collaborative software engineering practices. 
○ Responsibilities 
• Development of complete projects from conception to implementation using Java and JSP 
• Resolving production-level issues 
• PLSQL for analyzing production issues 
• Maintenance of the institutional website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript 
|
○ Projects 
 • Immediate Debit 
Integration of a third-party immediate debit transactions API into the electronic banking system, enabling fund transfers between accounts. My responsibilities included: 
- Backend API integration 
- Development of user interfaces with JSP and JavaScript 
- Collaborative task planning

items.description: Como Software Developer en Mercado Libre, desarrollé soluciones full-stack integrales, aplicando prácticas avanzadas de ingeniería de software y técnicas innovadoras de UI.
items.fullDescription:
○ Responsabilidades 
 • Diseño e implementación de APIs REST con Java 11 
 • Desarrollo de componentes con ReactJS 
 • Implementación de mapeo de componentes con técnica Server Driven UI 
 • Participación en planificación ágil y gestión de tareas 
|
 ○ Proyectos 
 • Inbound Invoice Creator 
 API REST sofisticada en Java para procesar y analizar eficientemente hojas de cálculo de información de envíos y facturas. 
 • Complementary invoices 
 API que permite a los vendedores cargar y gestionar facturas pendientes para evitar problemas fiscales.

items.description: En mi primer rol profesional, desarrollé soluciones de software integrales para la plataforma de Banca Corporativa de ICBC utilizando tecnologías Java, JSP, Struts y JavaScript.
items.fullDescription:
Durante mi primera experiencia profesional en ICBC, fui mentoreado por desarrolladores senior y mid-level, expandiendo mis habilidades de desarrollo web y aprendiendo prácticas colaborativas de ingeniería de software. 
○ Responsabilidades 
• Desarrollo de proyectos completos desde su concepción hasta su implementación usando Java y JSP 
• Resolución de problemas a nivel de producción 
• PLSQL para análisis de issues en producción 
• Mantenimiento del sitio web institucional usando HTML, CSS y JavaScript 
|
○ Proyectos 
 • Débito Inmediato 
Integración de API de transacciones de débito inmediato de terceros al sistema de banca electrónica, permitiendo transferencias de fondos entre cuentas. Mis responsabilidades incluyeron: 
- Integración de API backend 
- Desarrollo de interfaces de usuario con JSP y JavaScript 
- Planificación colaborativa de tareas
